# ekstrom.nu
## Site built using Hugo

Hosting powered By Cloudflare
[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://pages.cloudflare.com/)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger)

This whole site was created using Hugo and the theme Hugo-theme-shell

- ✨Deployed on Cloudflare Pages ✨


## Installation

Inside cloudflare pages its deployed with the following build command 

```sh
Build command: hugo -t hugo-theme-shell -D

```

Environment variables set up are 

```sh
CF_PAGES_URL - ekstrom.nu
HUGO_VERSION - 0.85.0
```
